img_summary: The image is a screenshot from a video game showing a battle scene. A character, wielding a staff, is engaged in combat with a large, white, furry creature. The setting appears to be an ancient, stone-paved area surrounded by greenery and traditional structures. The game interface displays health bars, character name "Lingxuzi," and icons indicating various abilities or items on the left side of the screen.
